00046 #ifndef _FC_SUBSET_P_H_
00047 #define _FC_SUBSET_P_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 // include these in basic data structures to simplify includes for the
00054 // the rest of the library which won't ever use them
00055 #include "tableP.h"
00056 #include "fileio.h"
00057 #include "fileioP.h"
00058 
00059 /**
00060  * \ingroup  PrivateSubset
00061  * \brief Struct describing subset elements
00062  *
00063  * \description 
00064  * 
00065  *    Structure to hold information about subset members. 
00066  *
00067  * \modifications 
00068  *    - 03/25/04 RM Created.
00069  *    - 05/11/04 WSK Modified to become like Dataset, Mesh, etc.
00070  *    - 08/10/06 WSD Changed to have only 1 type of storage = sorted int array.
00071  *    - 03-03-08 ACG added seq for seqSubsets
00072  */
00073 typedef struct {
00074   _FC_SlotHeader header; /**< Header, which contains general purpose info. */
00075   FC_Mesh mesh;          /**< Handle to owning mesh */
00076   FC_Sequence sequence; /**< Handle to the owning sequence (can be NULL) */
00077   int stepID;           /**< ID of step in a sequence, -1 if sequence == NULL */ 
00078   //---File reference
00079   _FC_SubFileIOInfo fileInfo; /**< Holds info pertinent to file access. */
00080   //---About the subset: members
00081   FC_AssociationType assoc; /**< subset association (elements, vortices etc.)*/
00082   int numMember;         /**< number of members, have to have in addition
00083                   to sia.numVal because sia is big data and could be
00084                   empty */
00085   int maxNumMember;      /**< maximum value for a member, same as the 
00086                    number of elements in mask array */
00087   FC_SortedIntArray sia; /**< member IDs stored in sorted int array */
00088   // int numMember;      // this is now sia.numVal
00089   // int* members;       // this is sia.vals 
00090 } _FC_SubSlot;
00091 
00092 // slot routines
00093 void _fc_initSubSlot(_FC_SubSlot *subSlot);
00094 void _fc_releaseSubSlot(_FC_SubSlot *subSlot);
00095 void _fc_clearSubSlot(_FC_SubSlot *subSlot);
00096 
00097 // table access
00098 int _fc_getSubTableSize(void);
00099 _FC_SubSlot* _fc_getSubSlot(FC_Subset subset);
00100 _FC_SubSlot* _fc_getSubSlotFromID(int subID);
00101 _FC_SubSlot* _fc_getNewSubSlot(void);
00102 FC_ReturnCode _fc_deleteSubSlot(FC_Subset subset);
00103 void _fc_printSubTable(char* label);
00104 void _fc_freeSubTable(void);
00105 
00106 #ifdef __cplusplus
00107 }
00108 #endif
00109 
00110 #endif // _FC_SUBSET_P_H_
